TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi StackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class StackPanel Inherits Panel Implements IScrollInfo

summary.span: 将子元素排列成水平或垂直的一行。

span.span: Arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含一套对象，后者是在属性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 默认值是两个 stretch和中包含的内容的。The default value is stretch for both and of content that is contained in a . 默认情况下，面板元素不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制要接收焦点的面板元素，将设置属性`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. 实现接口以支持逻辑滚动。 implements the interface to support logical scrolling. 逻辑滚动用于滚动的逻辑树中的下一个元素。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 这是相反的物理滚动，按照指定方向在一个定义物理增量来滚动内容。This is in contrast to physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机中的元素并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a can scroll in the horizontal dimension.

value.span: 如果内容可以水平滚动，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不被应在代码中使用。This property is not intended to be used in your code. 它公开以满足接口协定 ()。It is exposed publicly to fulfill an interface contract (). 将此属性设置不起作用。Setting this property has no effect. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定如何中的元素（上下堆积其他或并行）。The following example shows how to use the property to specify how elements within a are stacked (one on top of the other or side by side). [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelOrientationExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/OrientationExample.xaml#stackpanelorientationexamplewholepage)] 下面的屏幕截图显示了此示例中的呈现效果。The screenshot below shows how this example renders. ![StackPanel 方向](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel 方向")![StackPanel orientation](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel orientation")
